text: O vy shcho vvazhayete, ne znyshchuyete vashi dobrodiynistʹ zapodiyuyuchy zakyd ta obrazu, lyubyte odyn khto vytrachaye yoho hroshi pokazaty, v toy chas, yak disbelieving u BOHU ta ostannʹomu Dni. Yoho pryklad vyhlyadaye yak skelya nakryta z tonkoyu verstvoyu hruntu; yak tilʹky vazhkyy doshch padinnya, tse myyetʹsya hrunt, lyshayuchy tse daremna skelya. Vony nichoho ne otrymuyutʹ z yikhnikh zusylʹ. BOH ne dovidnyk disbelieving lyudy
